title: Step 23

challengeFiles.name: index
styles

tests.text: Your .cat-left-ear selector should have a position property set to absolute. Don't forget to add a semi-colon.
Your .cat-left-ear selector should have a top property set to -26px
Your .cat-left-ear selector should have a left property set to -31px

description: Move the left ear into position by setting a position of absolute, a top of -26px, and a left of -31px.
